project_abstract.cdata: Construction of a 1,725 tpd urea plant, including an intermediate ammonia production plant of 1,000 tpd at Goth Machhi, Province of the Punjab. The project also includes the construction of a 33-mile pipeline to transport gas from the Mari field to the project site and all necessary auxillary facilities.
